meanings.definition: Relating to or undergoing a reversible adiabatic process.
meanings.sent1: The isentropic expansion of the gas resulted in a temperature drop.
meanings.sent2: The engineer studied the isentropic process to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The isentropic air conditioning system was so efficient, it made the other systems jealous.
meanings.sent4: Her isentropic thinking led to a perfectly balanced solution.
meanings.sent5: The isentropic nature of the reaction kept the energy constant throughout.
